title: So'al Koronavirus
licenseNotes: 'Afi' nggati tulisan mana sia buku ia, te bisa terjemahkan e, rub'a e neu bentuk laen, ma bisa banggi, sad'i 'afi' seo. Ata musi fee kredit neu mana sura' noo mana nggambar a, Weiman Kow.
credits: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

11.row: Hambu 'aka' 'a dala' ESA fo hei parlu mihine so'al ta'o bee fo koronavirus a
11.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

12.row: Hambu 'aka' 'a dala' ESA fo hei parlu mihine so'al ta'o bee fo koronavirus a
12.en: There's only ONE thing ﻿you need to understand about how a coronavirus

27.row: Virus a dai atahori, lele' oe titi' ia ra,

28.row: Virus a dai atahori, lele' oe titi' ia ra,

29.row: Mu'ud'od'oo'! Meter 2 fo fe'e na nda dai oe titi monae' sa.
29.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m will keep you safe from large droplets.

30.row: Mu'ud'od'oo'! Meter 2 fo fe'e na nda dai oe titi monae' sa.
30.en: Keep your distance.﻿2m will keep you safe from large droplets.

37.row: Dad'i, mete ma mita atahori esa boo, 'esufani, namahed'i na:
37.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

38.row: Dad'i, mete ma mita atahori esa boo, 'esufani, namahed'i na:
38.en: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

39.row: Fee se masker. Ara bisa boo do 'esufani neu e, naa fo 'afi' dai atahori mana deka-deka' ra.
39.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby.

40.row: Fee se masker. Ara bisa boo do 'esufani neu e, naa fo 'afi' dai atahori mana deka-deka' ra.
40.en: Give them a mask.﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby.

47.row: Mbei ma ana nda namahed'i sa te ana  nanea ao na mia hed'is.
47.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

48.row: Mbei ma ana nda namahed'i sa te ana  nanea ao na mia hed'is.
48.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

49.row: La'e faa na atahori mana dai koronovirus a nda natud'u tanda sa, te ana bisa tao atahori laen dai koronavirus.
49.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

50.row: La'e faa na atahori mana dai koronovirus a nda natud'u tanda sa, te ana bisa tao atahori laen dai koronavirus.
50.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are still﻿infectious

51.row: Boe ma, malole lena' mu'ud'odoo' mia atahori mana ma'ab'ub'ue' ra, huu nda muhine atahori bee mamahed'i' sa.
51.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

52.row: Boe ma, malole lena' mu'ud'odoo' mia atahori mana ma'ab'ub'ue' ra, huu nda muhine atahori bee mamahed'i' sa.
52.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

67.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

68.en: & even on the outside of your face mask

79.row: Te la'e faa na, atahori mamahed'i' esa mirun bisa dai sud'i a saa laen ra.
79.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

80.row: Te la'e faa na, atahori mamahed'i' esa mirun bisa dai sud'i a saa laen ra.
80.en: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

83.row: do atahori fo hoo sue' ra mata na ra.

84.row: do atahori fo hoo sue' ra mata na ra.

87.row: Ma mete ma, hoo nda sangaja sa, te nggama dai sud'i 'a saa, naa ra, basa ma nggama mata ma,
87.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

88.row: Ma mete ma, hoo nda sangaja sa, te nggama dai sud'i 'a saa, naa ra, basa ma nggama mata ma,
88.en: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

89.row: ma hambu 'aka' dala malole' esa fo tamopo' virus ra, naeni safe hendi se tendi' sab'u, pemutih, do alkohol.
89.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

90.row: ma hambu 'aka' dala malole' esa fo tamopo' virus ra, naeni safe hendi se tendi' sab'u, pemutih, do alkohol.
90.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

91.row: Virus ra bisa ra'atataa' losa jam hira sia sud'i 'a saa ra,
91.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

92.row: Virus ra bisa ra'atataa' losa jam hira sia sud'i 'a saa ra,
92.en: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects,

97.row: Naa de malole lena' ata tao tungga dala-dala pencegahan ia ra.
97.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

98.row: Naa de malole lena' ata tao tungga dala-dala pencegahan ia ra.
98.en: Which is why it is also good to follow these

99.en: wash with soap up to here

100.en: wash with soap up to here

105.row: 'Afi' nggama mata ma. (Do atahori laen mata na ra.) Mete ma hoo musi nggama, na, safe malolole basa lima ma ra mendi' sab'u dei.
105.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

106.row: 'Afi' nggama mata ma. (Do atahori laen mata na ra.) Mete ma hoo musi nggama, na, safe malolole basa lima ma ra mendi' sab'u dei.
106.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

107.row: Naa doo na 'ona' hita sod'a sosod'a fai bob'onggi' lao rua.
107.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

108.row: Naa doo na 'ona' hita sod'a sosod'a fai bob'onggi' lao rua.
108.en: Enough time to sing “Happy Birthday” twice

113.row: Safe lima 'u'u ma ra talad'a na ra.

114.row: Safe lima 'u'u ma ra talad'a na ra.

115.row: Safe lima ma ra dea na ra.
115.en: wash the back of your hands

116.row: Safe lima ma ra dea na ra.
116.en: wash the back of your hands

119.row: Mete ma nggama dai masker a dea', na, 'afi' dud'ua nae'. Sad'i basa na safe lima ma ra mendi' sab'u.
119.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

120.row: Mete ma nggama dai masker a dea', na, 'afi' dud'ua nae'. Sad'i basa na safe lima ma ra mendi' sab'u.
120.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

121.row: Boe ma, kalo bisa na 'afi' nggama masker a dea'.
121.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

122.row: Boe ma, kalo bisa na 'afi' nggama masker a dea'.
122.en: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

125.row: *Bakteri ra mori sia masker ra rala' mete ma hita pake se losa doo' talalu.
125.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

126.row: *Bakteri ra mori sia masker ra rala' mete ma hita pake se losa doo' talalu.
126.en: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

127.row: Nggari hendi masker ra, mete ma rasa ara manggenggeo' ena. 'Afi' pake se lena' fai esa.
127.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

128.row: Nggari hendi masker ra, mete ma rasa ara manggenggeo' ena. 'Afi' pake se lena' fai esa.
128.en: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

139.row: 'Afi' mia mi'ib'ue nanaat, ma pake mi'ib'ue sud'i 'a sa ra, mok, handuk.
139.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

140.row: 'Afi' mia mi'ib'ue nanaat, ma pake mi'ib'ue sud'i 'a sa ra, mok, handuk.
140.en: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

141.row: Mae hoo sob'a o, hoo nda bisa nggama mata ma mendi' lima buku ma sa.
141.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

142.row: Mae hoo sob'a o, hoo nda bisa nggama mata ma mendi' lima buku ma sa.
142.en: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

143.row: Kalu bisa na, buka ma 'ena lelesu ra mendi' lima buku ma do mbili ma ra.
143.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

144.row: Kalu bisa na, buka ma 'ena lelesu ra mendi' lima buku ma do mbili ma ra.
144.en: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

147.en: and after being out in the public

148.en: and after being out in the public

151.row: Safe lima ma ra mendi' sab'u nakandoo 'a.
151.en: Always wash your hands with soap…

152.row: Safe lima ma ra mendi' sab'u nakandoo 'a.
152.en: Always wash your hands with soap…
